overview: Nishant Dixit (born September 2, 1992 in Delhi, India) is an Indian entrepreneur and the co-founder of the Tech Blog Cuttinglet.com. He started his career in 2011 with some word press sites which went offline after a year. After that, in June 2012, he started a new project, Cuttinglet, focusing on tech news, with his friend. Nishant didn’t graduated from high school and college yet and is currently working on Cuttinglet.com only. He started his programming carrier by C in 2012 and after that he started his major project Cuttinglet.com by making slight changes to the word press coding and its database function.
